class.name: SubscriptionOfferView
class.brief_description: A view for redeeming subscription offers.
class.description: This class provides a view for users to redeem subscription offer codes. It handles the UI flow for entering and verifying offer codes.

method.name: present
method.description: Presents the offer code redemption view. note: The `callback` parameter is currently unused; use the [signal success] and [signal error] signals to handle the result.

members.member: The title displayed on the view.

signal.name: error
signal.description: Emitted when the offer redemption fails. `arg1` contains the error message.

signal.name: success
signal.description: Emitted when the offer redemption is successful.
